Statements.Statement:
SELECT `item`.`GroupCode`, `item`.`GroupName`, `item`.`AliasName`, `item`.`DefaultEachUnitCode`, `each`.`Name` AS `DefaultEachUnitName`, `item`.`DefaultPackingUnitCode`, `pack`.`Name` AS `DefaultPackingUnitName`, `item`.`Remark`
FROM `soodal`.`tb_itemgroup` AS item LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_codedetail` AS `each` ON `each`.`MasterCode` = 'ITEMUNIT' AND `each`.`Code` = `item`.`DefaultEachUnitCode` LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_codedetail` AS `pack` ON `pack`.`MasterCode` = 'PACKINGUNIT' AND `pack`.`Code` = `item`.`DefaultPackingUnitCode` WHERE 1=1 AND `item`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode
`item`.`GroupCode` Like Concat('%', @GroupCode, '%')
`item`.`GroupName` Like Concat('%', @GroupName, '%')
`item`.`AliasName` Like Concat('%', @AliasName, '%')

SELECT `item`.`GroupCode`, `item`.`GroupName`, `item`.`AliasName`, `item`.`DefaultEachUnitCode`, `each`.`Name` AS `DefaultEachUnitName`, `item`.`DefaultPackingUnitCode`, `pack`.`Name` AS `DefaultPackingUnitName`, `item`.`Remark`
FROM `soodal`.`tb_itemgroup` AS item LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_codedetail` AS `each` ON `each`.`MasterCode` = 'ITEMUNIT' AND `each`.`Code` = `item`.`DefaultEachUnitCode` LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_codedetail` AS `pack` ON `pack`.`MasterCode` = 'PACKINGUNIT' AND `pack`.`Code` = `item`.`DefaultPackingUnitCode` WHERE 1=1 AND `item`.`GroupCode` = @GroupCode AND `item`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `soodal`.`tb_itemgroup` (`GroupCode`, `GroupName`, `AliasName`, `DefaultEachUnitCode`, `DefaultPackingUnitCode`, `Remark`, `CompanyCode`, `DelYn`, `CreateId`, `CreateDt` ) VALUES (@GroupCode, @GroupName, @AliasName, @DefaultEachUnitCode, @DefaultPackingUnitCode, @Remark, @CompanyCode, 'N', @CreateId, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `GroupName` = @GroupName, `AliasName` = @AliasName, `DefaultEachUnitCode` = @DefaultEachUnitCode, `DefaultPackingUnitCode` = @DefaultPackingUnitCode, `Remark` = @Remark, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = null, `DeleteDt` = null

SELECT `item`.`GroupCode`, `item`.`ItemCode`, `item`.`ItemNo`, `item`.`ItemName`, `item`.`AliasName`, `item`.`SIze`, `item`.`AliasSize`, `item`.`Description`, `item`.`AliasDescription`, `item`.`UnitCode`, `item`.`Remark`
FROM `soodal`.`tb_item` AS `item` WHERE 1=1 AND `item`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `item`.`GroupCode` = @GroupCode

SELECT `item`.`GroupCode`, `item`.`ItemCode`, `item`.`ItemNo`, `item`.`ItemName`, `item`.`AliasName`, `item`.`SIze`, `item`.`AliasSize`, `item`.`Description`, `item`.`AliasDescription`, `item`.`UnitCode`, `item`.`Remark`
FROM `soodal`.`tb_item` AS `item` WHERE 1=1 AND `item`.`GroupCode` = @GroupCode AND `item`.`ItemCode` = @ItemCode AND `item`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `soodal`.`tb_item` (`GroupCode`, `ItemCode`, `ItemNo`, `ItemName`, `AliasName`, `SIze`, `AliasSize`, `Description`, `AliasDescription`, `UnitCode`, `Remark`, `CompanyCode`, `DelYn`, `CreateId`, `CreateDt` ) VALUES (@GroupCode, FN_CreateItemCode(@CompanyCode, @GroupCode, @ItemCode), @ItemNo, @ItemName, @AliasName, @SIze, @AliasSize, @Description, @AliasDescription, @UnitCode, @Remark, @CompanyCode, 'N', @CreateId, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `ItemNo` = @ItemNo, `ItemName` = @ItemName, `AliasName` = @AliasName, `SIze` = @SIze, `AliasSize` = @AliasSize, `Description` = @Description, `AliasDescription` = @AliasDescription, `UnitCode` = @UnitCode, `Remark` = @Remark, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = null, `DeleteDt` = null
UPDATE `soodal`.`tb_item` SET `DelYn` = 'Y', `DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `GroupCode` = @GroupCode AND `ItemCode` = @ItemCode AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode
